## Frequency table for `r params$var`

```{r, echo = F}
create_table <- function(dataset, var){
dataset <- get(dataset)
table(dataset[var]) |>
knitr::kable()
}
```

The table below is for variable `r params$var` of dataset `r params$dataset`.

```{r}
create_table(params$dataset, params$var)
```
